d0af59a9-04ae-4922-97eb-dc29f5bc44e3.Statement: the primary trial and the secondary trial use completely different drugs and techniques for their interventions, however they both require trained Radiologists on site for evaluation.

31387af4-aad1-4f3c-bd81-641340ad4096.Statement: the primary trial and the secondary trial use completely different drugs and techniques for their interventions.

228e80ab-84d6-4b60-9960-dcdcbd78c03c.Statement: Patients with an FEV1 of 80% to 120% are ineligible for the primary trial.

57f3a264-9119-4931-9f9c-9cb20e945973.Statement: the primary trial is testing a chemotherapy treatment whereas the secondary trial is testing a physcotherapy course.

d811aaec-b3bd-4376-a9d6-d14eacae875a.Statement: Prior axillary surgery, axillary radiation, breast cancer and breast radiation are not permitted for entry to the primary trial, patients with prior High-dose chemotherapy can still enter if they satisfy all other inclusion criteria.

9e655973-7d1d-4528-8394-a9cbcf0b978f.Statement: Adult Patients with Histologically proven HER2- infiltrating breast cancer that have had a Previous lumpectomy or same side mammary reduction are excluded from both the secondary trial and the primary trial.

c32d1b74-07ab-4afb-9db6-878e20727661.Label: Contradiction

e3265040-8316-4f62-969c-27af396ba18c.Statement: Patients that have previously been trated with bevacizumab are not eligible for the primary trial, unless they have also received carboplatin 2 weeks prior to study entry.

2b79f9cc-4262-4353-ad28-91cda07a9b9a.Statement: Patients must have AST, ALP and ALT < 1.5 ULN to participate in the primary trial.

ac193d32-156e-48bf-bc6b-d613691f869c.Statement: the primary trial only recorded three types of adverse events.
